record.title: NATIONAL MEDAL OF HONOR DAY

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to S. Con. Res. 12.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I further ask the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table and that any statements relating to this measure be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
